name: Air Sea Golf
description:
If you have problems playing it embedded within itch.io, you can also find it at http://lmnopc.com/air-sea-golf/

HOW TO PLAY

Click and drag your finger or mouse from anywhere on the screen to start aiming. Move left and right to control angle, and move up and down to control the power.  Release to shoot the ball.  

If you're confused, watch this handy video!
